title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions
OB: When using the application, the recently used files do not appear in the File menu's MRU (Most Recently Used) list.
EB: The recently used files should be persisted between sessions and appear in the File menu's MRU list.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench. The recently used files should now be displayed in the File menu's MRU list.
